description:
Harmony brings her flexible friend Tiffany Holiday for Chanta to play with, and play with them she does. She ties them both in wonderful bondage positions, fucks them, makes them fuck eachother, and gets them wet in every scene. She even lets Harmony top for awhile, and you can tell by the way she dunks and scrubs her friend that she enjoys topping just as much as subbing!
This is a weekend BONUS update.
title: Tiffany Holiday and Harmony
